short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show a Youtube video's remaining view time based on current position and playback speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After installing the extension, refresh your browser and watch a Youtube video. You should see a new time value in the video's control panel that tells you how much time is left in the video.
